SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.network

Interface GameServer

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
GameServer, GameServerImpl
public interface GameServer extends Remote
This interface represents a game server. It provides methods for creating and joining game sessions, listing available game sessions, and registering clients.

  • Method Details

    • createNewSession

      GameControllerRemote createNewSession(String gameId, String username, int desiredPlayers, GameObserver observer) throws RemoteException
      Creates a new game session.
      Parameters:
      gameId - the ID of the game session
      username - the username of the player
      desiredPlayers - the number of players desired for the game session
      observer - the observer to notify of updates
      Returns:
      the game controller for the new game session
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if the remote invocation fails

    • joinSession

      Joins an existing game session.
      Parameters:
      gameId - the ID of the game session
      username - the username of the player
      observer - the observer to notify of updates
      Returns:
      the game controller for the game session
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if the remote invocation fails

    • isUsernameTaken

      boolean isUsernameTaken(String username) throws RemoteException
      Checks if the specified username is already taken.
      Parameters:
      username - the username to check
      Returns:
      true if the username is taken, false otherwise
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if the remote invocation fails
